${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Thruster.NAME: Thruster
${modID}:Thruster.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Impact.NAME: Impact
${modID}:Impact.DESCRIPTION: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Lose half ${modID}:Momentum. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:QuickShot.NAME: Quick Shot
${modID}:QuickShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Pulse: Deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:DiveShot.NAME: Dive Shot
${modID}:DiveShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Impulse !D! (the amount of damage dealt).

${modID}:SwitchUp.NAME: Switch-Up
${modID}:SwitchUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:Block2! Block. NL ${modID}:Pulse: Gain !M! Temporary Strength NL ${modID}:Pulse: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Pulse.

${modID}:SuppressiveFire.NAME: Suppressive Fire
${modID}:SuppressiveFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !M! Weak to 2 random enemies. NL ${modID}:Pulse: Deal !D! damage and !M! Weak to 2 more random enemies.

${modID}:Slide.NAME: Slide
${modID}:Slide.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL {@@}Next turn, draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ThrustVectoring.NAME: Thrust Vectoring
${modID}:ThrustVectoring.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain ${modID}:Momentum and Block equal to the remaining cards in your hand.
${modID}:ThrustVectoring.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain ${modID}:Momentum and Block equal to twice the remaining cards in your hand.

${modID}:Prechargers.NAME: Prechargers
${modID}:Prechargers.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Shuffle !M! *Thrusters into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SeismicToss.NAME: Seismic Toss
${modID}:SeismicToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your current ${modID}:Momentum. NL ${modID}:Pulse: Exhaust this card.

${modID}:AllIn.NAME: All In
${modID}:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: When you deal unblocked attack damage, gain !M! Block. NL Gain 99 Frail.

${modID}:BruteForce.NAME: Brute Force
${modID}:BruteForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal additional damage equal to !M! times the number of skills in your discard pile.

${modID}:Inertia.NAME: Inertia
${modID}:Inertia.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to ${modID}:Momentum. (!B! Block) NL Lose half ${modID}:Momentum (rounded up). NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Inertia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to ${modID}:Momentum. (!B! Block) NL Lose half ${modID}:Momentum (rounded up).

${modID}:BoostKick.NAME: Boost Kick
${modID}:BoostKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Shuffle a *Thruster into your draw pile.

${modID}:ReverseBoost.NAME: Reverse Boost
${modID}:ReverseBoost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Shuffle a *Thruster into your draw pile.

${modID}:Afterburner.NAME: Afterburner
${modID}:Afterburner.DESCRIPTION: Draw !${modID}:baseDraw! cards.  If you draw any *Thrusters, draw !M! additional {@@}card{!M!|>1=s}.

${modID}:Acceleration.NAME: Acceleration
${modID}:Acceleration.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle !M! *Thrusters into your draw pile.

${modID}:FollowThrough.NAME: Follow Through
${modID}:FollowThrough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional card.

${modID}:SeekHigherGround.NAME: Seek Higher Ground
${modID}:SeekHigherGround.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies.

${modID}:RunAndGun.NAME: Run And Gun
${modID}:RunAndGun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:Sidestep.NAME: Sidestep
${modID}:Sidestep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary Dexterity. NL ${modID}:Pulse: Gain !M! Temporary Dexterity again.

${modID}:DoItAgain.NAME: Do It Again
${modID}:DoItAgain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Pulse: Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

${modID}:PulseWidthModulator.NAME: PWM
${modID}:PulseWidthModulator.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! *Invert to your hand.
${modID}:PulseWidthModulator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL At the start of your turn, add !M! *Invert to your hand.

${modID}:HopManeuvers.NAME: Hop Maneuvers
${modID}:HopManeuvers.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Momentum when you trigger a ${modID}:Pulse effect.

${modID}:ReactionForce.NAME: Reaction Force
${modID}:ReactionForce.DESCRIPTION: After playing an *Impact, gain Block equal to remaining ${modID}:Momentum.

${modID}:TwinThrusters.NAME: Twin Thrusters
${modID}:TwinThrusters.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Thruster into your draw pile for each *Thruster in your hand.

${modID}:BoostThruster.NAME: Boost Thruster
${modID}:BoostThruster.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a *Thruster into your draw pile.

${modID}:RunningStart.NAME: Running Start
${modID}:RunningStart.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL ${modID}:Impulse !M!. NL End of turn, gain Block equal to ${modID}:Momentum. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Coasting.NAME: Coasting
${modID}:Coasting.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for every 2 *Thrusters in your discard pile

${modID}:SkipShot.NAME: Skip Shot
${modID}:SkipShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Pulse: Add a *Skip that does !M! more damage to your hand.
${modID}:SkipShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Pulse: Add a *Skip+ that does !M! more damage to your hand.

${modID}:Skip.NAME: Skip
${modID}:Skip.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Pulse: Add a *Skip that does !M! more damage to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Skip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Pulse: Add a *Skip+ that does !M! more damage to your hand.

${modID}:SpeedBoost.NAME: Speed Boost
${modID}:SpeedBoost.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a card during your turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Momentum.

${modID}:ExhaustJets.NAME: Exhaust Jets
${modID}:ExhaustJets.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Gain !B! Block. NL If you exhausted a *Thruster, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:PulseFrequency.NAME: Pulse Frequency
${modID}:PulseFrequency.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Pulse: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Pulse: Deal !${modID}:damage2! damage twice. NL ${modID}:Pulse: Apply !M! Weak. NL ${modID}:Pulse: Draw !${modID}:magic2! cards.

${modID}:Unburden.NAME: Unburden
${modID}:Unburden.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! {@@}card{!M!|>1=s} in your hand. NL Gain !${modID}:magic2! ${modID}:Momentum for each Exhausted card.

${modID}:FocalPoint.NAME: Focal Point
${modID}:FocalPoint.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.

${modID}:ApexArc.NAME: Apex Arc
${modID}:ApexArc.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card this turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Momentum. NL Next turn, ${modID}:Impulse 1.

${modID}:ShieldNova.NAME: Shield Nova
${modID}:ShieldNova.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to your Block. NL ${modID}:Pulse: Lose all Block.

${modID}:Crater.NAME: Crater
${modID}:Crater.DESCRIPTION: Your next *Impact played this turn targets ALL enemies.

${modID}:WristHolster.NAME: Wrist Holster
${modID}:WristHolster.DESCRIPTION: Put an Attack from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL It costs 0 until played. NL End your turn.

${modID}:LoopAround.NAME: Loop Around
${modID}:LoopAround.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL For each Attack drawn, gain !${modID}:magic2! ${modID}:Momentum. NL Discard Skills drawn this way.

${modID}:KineticGenerator.NAME: Kinetic Generator
${modID}:KineticGenerator.DESCRIPTION: Requires !${modID}:reqM! ${modID}:Momentum to play. NL Lose !${modID}:reqM! ${modID}:Momentum. NL Gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:DragFlaps.NAME: Drag Flaps
${modID}:DragFlaps.DESCRIPTION: Requires !M! ${modID}:Momentum to play. NL Lose !M! ${modID}:Momentum. NL Gain [E]. NL ${modID}:Pulse: Gain [E]

${modID}:ReThrust.NAME: Re-Thrust
${modID}:ReThrust.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all *Thrusters in your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:ChargeThrusters.NAME: Charge Thrusters
${modID}:ChargeThrusters.DESCRIPTION: Put a *Thruster on top of your draw pile and gain [E] at the start of your next X turns. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ChargeThrusters.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a *Thruster on top of your draw pile and gain [E] at the start of your next X+1 turns. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Stalling.NAME: Stalling
${modID}:Stalling.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of next turn, gain ${modID}:Momentum equal to remaining Block.

${modID}:Impulsive.NAME: Impulsive
${modID}:Impulsive.DESCRIPTION: *Impacts cost an additional [E] , gain Ethereal, and deal double damage.
${modID}:Impulsive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL *Impacts cost an additional [E] , gain Ethereal, and deal double damage.

${modID}:HighJumpKick.NAME: High Jump Kick
${modID}:HighJumpKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, with bonus damage per !M! ${modID}:Momentum. NL If you deal at least !${modID}:reqDmg! damage, gain [E] and draw a card.

${modID}:FullStop.NAME: Full Stop
${modID}:FullStop.DESCRIPTION: Double your ${modID}:Momentum. NL At the end of this turn, lose all ${modID}:Momentum. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ImprovisedBarrage.NAME: Improvised Barrage
${modID}:ImprovisedBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Deal !D! damage per card discarded. NL Draw !M! cards.
